palette.title: Arthur C. Clarke
palette.description:
One of my all-time favorite authors is Sir Arthur C. Clarke. He was a prolific writer, whose best known works include 2001: A Space Odyssey, Childhood's End, and Rendezvous with Rama.
Clarke was one of the first science fiction writers I read, helping to create in me a life-long love for the genre, one of my healthier forms of escapism.
